name: Solstice Snow Globe
description:
At the top of a small mountain lies an ancient construct that we call the Solstice Snow Globe. We journey to it every winter solstice to savor the winter magic and the romantic atmosphere.

Even though it only takes about five minutes to get there, the journey tends to put you on a good mood. Especially if you're looking for something festive, atmospheric and relaxing.

So, how about giving it a try?
